    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/953</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>

          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Habitants de l'horitzó</string>
            <string language="en">Inhabitants of the horizon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Einwohner des Horizontes</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Habitants de l'horizon</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Habitantes do horizonte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abitanti dell'orizzonte</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Κάτοικοι του ορίζοντα</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Treball de recerca sobre un treball de camp d'ornitologia al Parc Natural de Montserrat. Conté una guia d'aus, un glossari (Annexos), dos jocs (estudi autodidacte) i enllaços externs. Segon premi (batxillerat) del X Concurs de Webs de Ciència.</string>
            <string language="en">Research project with fieldwork carried out in Montserrat Natural Park. It includes a guide to birds, a glossary (annexes), two games (self-study) and external links. Second prize (secondary schools) in the 10th science webpage competition.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal</string>
            <string language="en">animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">ecologia</string>
            <string language="en">ecology</string>
            <string language="es">ecología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">etologia</string>
            <string language="en">ethology</string>
            <string language="es">etología</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">parc</string>
            <string language="en">park</string>
            <string language="es">parque</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">vertebrat</string>
            <string language="en">vertebrate</string>
            <string language="es">vertebrado</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">animal salvatge</string>
            <string language="en">wild animal</string>
            <string language="es">animal salvaje</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">zoologia</string>
            <string language="en">zoology</string>
            <string language="es">zoología</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Forschung Projekt mit der Feldarbeit 
durchgeführt Montserrat im natürlichen Park. Er schließt eine
Anleitung zu den Vögeln, zu einem Glossar (Anhänge), zu zwei Spielen
(Selbststudium) und zu den externen Links ein. Zweiter Preis 
(Sekundärschulen) in der 10. Wissenschaft Webseite Konkurrenz.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Projet de recherche avec des travaux sur le 
terrain effectués en parc normal de Montserrat. Il inclut un 
guide des oiseaux, d'un glossaire (annexes), de deux jeux 
(art de l'auto-portrait-study) et de liens externes. Deuxième prix (écoles 
secondaires) en 10ème concurrence de page Web de la science.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Projeto de pesquisa com o fieldwork realizado no 
parque natural de Montserrat. Inclui uma guia aos pássaros, a 
um glossário (anexos), a dois jogos (self-study) e às ligações 
externas. Segundo prêmio (escolas secundárias) na 10o 
competição do Web page da ciência.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Progetto di ricerca con lavori sul terreno 
effettuati nel parco naturale di Montserrat. Include una guida 
agli uccelli, ad un glossario (annessi), a due giochi (autodidattica) 
ed ai collegamenti esterni. Secondo premio (scuole secondarie) 
nella decima concorrenza di Web page di scienza.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ερευνητικό πρόγραμμα με την εργασία υπαίθριου που 
πραγματοποιείται στο φυσικό πάρκο του Μοντσερράτ. 
Περιλαμβάνει έναν οδηγό στα πουλιά, γλωσσάρι 
(παραρτήματα), δύο παιχνίδια (μόνος-μελέτη) και τις εξωτερικές 
συνδέσεις. Δεύτερο βραβείο (δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση) στο 
10ο ανταγωνισμό webpage επιστήμης.</string>
          </description>
